In a call to analysts, he explained that the previous structure, in which the triumvirate took collective decisions, had slowed down decision making. He said the changes would help clarify the

commitment and the expertise each person offers.'' One critic asked about X-Factor allowing kids as young as 12 to audition, noting Simon Cowell has criticized exposing children to the intense TV competition spotlight. We've started to see a trend with kids this age and what they can do... times have changed... you have to make a case-by-case decision based on them as a person.
